summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PDF/Excel export functionality for Analytics and Classes pages in bilingual student progress app. All backend endpoints and frontend UI buttons are working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Language switching from EN to AR may not be working properly - UI remains in English after clicking AR button
Console warnings about chart width/height being -1, suggesting responsive chart sizing issues

passed_tests: All CRUD operations (Classes, Students, Roles, Users, Remedial Plans, Rewards)
Analytics page UI loading and navigation
Classes page UI loading and navigation
Proper data-testid attributes for all export buttons
No JavaScript errors during export operations

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All 32 backend tests passed including new Analytics and Classes export endpoints
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All core export functionality working, minor language switching and chart sizing issues
